title: Homicide. Episode 12: The Decimal Point
abstract: This is one of the very early episodes of the landmark 'Homicide' series that ran from 1964 to 1976. The detectives investigate a double murder and are forced to reopen an old file.
description: What starts out looking like a straightforward crime committed in self-defence becomes a complicated double murder investigation prompting homicide detectives to reopen an old file. One of the murder victims, a prison escapee, was a suspect in an unsolved robbery case and the detectives suspect the hidden cash may be the motive for the murders.
